Speaker: voice_standart
Text: Here, in the east, the equipment does not last long because of the fighting.

Speaker: voice_standart
Text: It often needs major repairs and new parts.

Speaker: voice_standart
Text: Masters of the 80th Brigade's repair company restore both damaged armored vehicles and weapons to life.

Speaker: voice_standart
Text: This is a section of the repair company.

Speaker: voice_standart
Text: What are your duties?

Speaker: voice_standart
Text: Restoration, repair of weapons equipment, which is on...

Speaker: voice_standart
Text: on the register of the military unit.

Speaker: voice_standart
Text: What is the most common range of tasks you perform here?

Speaker: voice_standart
Text: What kind of equipment?

Speaker: voice_standart
Text: Or all the equipment in general?

Speaker: voice_standart
Text: All the equipment.

Speaker: voice_standart
Text: Various.

Speaker: voice_standart
Text: Starts with cars provided by volunteers, units, battalions.

Speaker: voice_standart
Text: He closes it all with tanks.

Speaker: voice_standart
Text: And what's the most difficult stage?

Speaker: voice_standart
Text: Weapons.

Speaker: voice_standart
Text: There is an experienced gunsmith in Remroth.

Speaker: voice_standart
Text: Vitaaliiy is proficient with various calibers, from pistols to large-caliber machine guns.

Speaker: voice_standart
Text: Neighboring brigades bring their weapons to us for repair.

Speaker: voice_standart
Text: They have no gunsmiths who have repaired weapons for anyone.

Speaker: voice_standart
Text: Here, in this case, it's an MG-42.

Speaker: voice_standart
Text: We collect MG-42s and MG-53s from Lihoslav, which we also have in our household.

Speaker: voice_standart
Text: We are currently under repair.

Speaker: voice_standart
Text: To cut out a complicated part for a foreign grenade launcher or weld the hull of a trophy APC, local craftsmen take on the most difficult orders from the front.

Speaker: voice_standart
Text: They say they can do anything.

Speaker: voice_standart
Text: Military television also made a small contribution to our victory.
